resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104768</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104768</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201842</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Graph our Litter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stellen Sie unsere Sänfte graphisch dar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Représentez graphiquement notre civière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Represente graficamente nossa maca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rappresenti graficamente il nostro disordine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραφική παράσταση τα απορρίματά μας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Represente nuestra litera gra'ficamente</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students examine their schoolyard for litter and graph its spread. Using TIGed Collaborations, your students can share their results with other students around the world and discuss what the causes might be for any differences.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer überprüfen ihr schoolyard für 
Sänfte und stellen seine Verbreitung graphisch dar. Mit TIGed 
Collaborations, können Ihre Kursteilnehmer ihre Resultate mit anderen
Kursteilnehmern um die Welt teilen und behandeln, was die Ursachen 
für alle mögliche Unterschiede sein konnten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants examinent leur cour de récréation pour la 
civière et représentent graphiquement sa diffusion. En 
utilisant TIGed Collaborations, vos étudiants peuvent partager leurs 
résultats avec d'autres étudiants autour du monde et discuter ce 
qu'être les causes pourraient pour toutes les différences.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes examinam seu schoolyard para a maca 
e representam graficamente sua propagação. Usando TIGed 
Collaborations, seus estudantes podem compartilhar de seus resultados 
com outros estudantes em torno do mundo e discutir o que as causas 
puderam ser para todas as diferenças.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi esaminano il loro schoolyard per il 
disordine e rappresentano graficamente la relativa diffusione. 
Usando TIGed Collaborations, i vostri allievi possono ripartire 
i loro risultati con altri allievi intorno al mondo e discutere che 
cosa le cause potrebbero essere per tutte le differenze.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές εξετάζουν schoolyard τους για τα 
απορρίματα και δίνουν με γραφική παράσταση τη διάδοσή του. 
Χρησιμοποιώντας τις συνεργασίες TIGed, οι σπουδαστές σας 
μπορούν να μοιραστούν τα αποτελέσματά τους με άλλους σπουδαστές 
σε όλο τον κόσμο και να συζητήσουν τι οι αιτίες να είναι για 
οποιεσδήποτε διαφορές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes examinan su schoolyard para la 
litera y representan su extensión gra'ficamente. Usando TIGed 
Collaborations, sus estudiantes pueden compartir sus resultados con 
otros estudiantes alrededor del mundo y discutir lo que pudieron ser 
las causas para cualquier diferencia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201842</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Free to use or adapt for educational purposes only</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104768</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/graph-our-litter</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
